pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a meta package that pulls in the necessary packages to use the XFCE desktop environment. It's been modified from the version available in the default Gentoo overlay: XFCE's themes are now optional and it's possible to select the GTK+3 theme as well as the GTK+2 one.

use.flag: If USE=themes is also selected, install XFCE's GTK+3 theme
Don't install extra fonts or icon themes
